Name: autoimmune cardiomyopathy
Definition: An autoimmune disease of cardiovascular system that is characterized by deterioration of the function of the heart muscle.

Name: cardiomyopathy
Definition: A heart disease and a myopathy that is characterized by deterioration of the function of the heart muscle.

Name: endocardium disease
Definition: A heart disease that is located_in the innermost layer of tissue that lines the chambers of the heart.

Name: heart conduction disease
Definition: A cardiovascular system disease that involves the heart's electrical conduction system.

Name: obsolete schizo-affective type schizophrenia in remission
Definition: A cardiovascular system disease that involves the heart's electrical conduction system.

Name: obsolete Pseudomonas intestinal infectious disease

Synonym: intestinal infectious disease due to pseudomonas

Name: obsolete Vasa previa complicating labor and delivery

Name: hypertensive heart disease
Definition: A heart disease that is caused by high blood pressure.

Name: congenital heart disease
Definition: A bladder disease that is characterized by inflammation of the bladder.

Name: obsolete glaucoma associated with vascular disorder
Definition: A bladder disease that is characterized by inflammation of the bladder.

Name: heart valve disease
Definition: A heart disease involving one or more of the four valves of the heart (the aortic and mitral valves on the left and the pulmonary and tricuspid valves on the right).

Name: congestive heart failure
Definition: A heart disease that is characterized by any structural or functional cardiac disorder that impairs the ability of the heart to fill with or pump a sufficient amount of blood throughout the body.

Name: heart lipoma
Definition: A heart lipoma that is located_in the epicardium and derives_from fat cells.

Name: rheumatic myocarditis
Definition: A bone inflammation disease that involves a response to irritation or injury
